channel.title: interaction on After Dark
channel.description: Recent content in interaction on After Dark

item.title: Button Group
item.description: With three Buttons, one ghosted and one of type info: {{< hackcss-buttongroup >}} {{< hackcss-button text="Left" />}} {{< hackcss-button type="info" >}}Middle{{< /hackcss-button >}} {{< hackcss-button text="Right" isghost="true" />}} {{< /hackcss-buttongroup >}} Left Middle Right With three Buttons styled using class attribute: <style>.btn-text button::after { content: attr(class) }</style> {{< hackcss-buttongroup class="btn-text" >}} {{< hackcss-button />}} {{< hackcss-button type="info" />}} {{< /hackcss-buttongroup >}} .btn-text button::after { content: attr(class) } With two Buttons inside a Form using formactions attribute:
item.content:encoded: With three Buttons, one ghosted and one of type info: {{&lt; hackcss-buttongroup &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button text=&#34;Left&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button type=&#34;info&#34; &gt;}}Middle{{&lt; /hackcss-button &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button text=&#34;Right&#34; isghost=&#34;true&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-buttongroup &gt;}} Left Middle Right With three Buttons styled using class attribute: &lt;style&gt;.btn-text button::after { content: attr(class) }&lt;/style&gt; {{&lt; hackcss-buttongroup class=&#34;btn-text&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button type=&#34;info&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-buttongroup &gt;}} .btn-text button::after { content: attr(class) } With two Buttons inside a Form using formactions attribute: {{&lt; hackcss-form action=&#34;/search&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-textinput type=&#34;hidden&#34; name=&#34;s&#34; value=&#34;button&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-buttongroup formactions=&#34;true&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button text=&#34;Print&#34; action=&#34;javascript:window.print()&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button text=&#34;Search&#34; type=&#34;primary&#34; isghost=&#34;true&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-buttongroup &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-form &gt;}} Print Search
